author: rse
msg: Similar to AddEncoding, the AddType, AddLanguage and AddHandler
directives are implemented with ITERATE2, so it is incorrect that they
can be used like "AddXXX <xxx> <ext1> <ext2>...". Instead they can be
only used like "AddXXX <xxx> <ext1> <xxx> <ext2>..." which is nothing
more than a short-hand for "AddXXX <xxx> <ext1>" plus "AddXXX <xxx>
